mapper.select: select SID, NAME, CATEGORYID, PROJECTID, STATUS, STOCKPRICE, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, OTHERPRICE1, OTHERPRICE2, WEIGHT, SIZES, COLOR, PICTURE1, PICTURE2, PICTURE3, PICTURE4, ORDERNUM, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CORPID, CONTENT, DESCR, ALIAS1 from db_bindproduct where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, NAME, CATEGORYID, PROJECTID, STATUS, STOCKPRICE, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, OTHERPRICE1, OTHERPRICE2, WEIGHT, SIZES, COLOR, PICTURE1, PICTURE2, PICTURE3, PICTURE4, ORDERNUM, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CORPID, CONTENT, DESCR, ALIAS1 from db_bindproduct
mapper.sql: SID , NAME , CATEGORYID , PROJECTID , STATUS , STOCKPRICE , COSTPRICE , SELLPRICE , OTHERPRICE1 , OTHERPRICE2 , WEIGHT , SIZES , COLOR , PICTURE1 , PICTURE2 , PICTURE3 , PICTURE4 , ORDERNUM , ALIAS2 , ALIAS3 , OPER , OPERTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE8 , CORPID , CONTENT , DESCR , ALIAS1

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STOCKPRICE = #{stockprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OTHERPRICE1 = #{otherprice1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OTHERPRICE2 = #{otherprice2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SIZES = #{sizes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICTURE1 = #{picture1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICTURE2 = #{picture2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICTURE3 = #{picture3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICTURE4 = #{picture4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ALIAS2 = #{alias2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ALIAS3 = #{alias3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ALIAS1 = #{alias1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
